Patients randomize 3 group : 1 . Luteal support progesterone ( receive vaginal P gel ( Crinone 8 % vaginal gel ; Serono , Israel ) 2 . DOC.brief_title: Luteal Phase Support With Progesterone Versus Estrogen Progesterone Pregnancy Rates
DOC.detailed_description: Study design : single center , 3 arm , prospective randomize control open study Objective : determine impact luteal phase support pregnancy rate ovarian stimulation IUI cycle recombinant FSH patient unexplained infertility mild male factor . Methods : All patient study group undergo single insemination procedure randomize 3 group : 1 . Luteal support progesterone ( receive vaginal P gel ( Crinone 8 % vaginal gel ; Serono , Israel ) 2 . Luteal support estrogen + progesterone [ ( Crinone 8 % vaginal gel ; Serono , Israel ) Estrofem 4mg ] . 3 . No luteal support Luteal support begin insemination continue 12th week gestation patient conceive . A pregnancy test perform 2 week insemination ( Serum hCG ) intrauterine pregnancy confirm use transvaginal ultrasound 2 week positive pregnancy test . If pregnancy achieve patient undergo 3 treatment cycle preferably treatment group .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Couples diagnosis unexplained infertility 2 . In treatment cycle ovarian stimulation IUI use recombinant FSH institution . 1. female partner one following : previous ovarian surgery one ovary polycystic ovary ultrasound examination endocrine abnormality ( i.e. , polycystic ovarian syndrome , thyroid disorder , hyperprolactinemia,6.hypogonadotropic hypogonadism ) past ovarian hyperstimulation hyperstimulation study period diminish ovarian reserve ( basal FSH level > 15 IU/mL ) age > 40 year 2. sever male factor < 5 million total motile sperm day insemination .
